name: Wand Wars VR
description:
Wand Wars VR is an innovative roguelike magic action adventure VR game with easy style by Unreal Engine 4, the full version has single and duo modes, both modes have 8-10 hours play time.

In Magic Age, you just become a wizard rookie of the Magic Academy, the academy is attacked by unknown demons. Although the enchantment can protect the academy now, it can't last long. The best way to defend is to attack! Find the enemy's lair and crash them!FEATURESRoguelikeRandom maps, random battles, random items, this game has a great replayabilityGame ModeSingle mode, duo mode, both modes have 8-10 hours play timeEasy StyleWe are not serious, we are not painful, we tease everything, including ourselvesInnovationDrawing recognition, full body IK, and the finishing moves!
